messages.subject: 'Nanban Tsuba'
messages.msgSnippet: Hello group, Speaking of books, does anyone have a lead, own, or know of where I can obtain a copy of Nanban Tsuba -Yearning Design- by Yoshimura Shigeta? I
messages.messageBody:
Hello group,

Speaking of books, does anyone have a lead, own, or know of where I can
obtain a copy of 'Nanban Tsuba' -Yearning Design- by Yoshimura Shigeta?

I have developed a desire to learn more about Nanban Tsuba. I don't
remember who alerted us to the PDF's that were available (the Joly book
about legends and the Tsuba book) but "Thank you very much".

Elliott
